column1: vEdya kOSika prajQApAramitA sUtram namaH sarva budDa boDisattveByaH
column2: @475b / /rgya gar skad du /a'arya koo shi ka pradzny'a p'a ra mi t'a / bod skad du / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa koo shi ka zhes bya ba / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //

column1: evam mayA Srutam
column2: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /

column1: ekasmin samaye BagavAn rAjagRhe viharati sma gRDrakUwe parvate mahatA Bikzu saMGena sArDam anekEH ca boDisattva Sata sahasrEH sarvEH
column2: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na / bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'bum @476a *// phrag du ma thams cad kyang gzhon nur gyur pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs ste /

column1: tatra Kalu BagavAn Sakram devAnAm indram Amantrayate sma
column2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa / koo shi ka /

column1: ayam kOSika prajQApAramitAyAH arTaH  prajQApAramitA na dvayena drazwavyAH na advayena
column2: de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ni 'di yin te / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su blta bar mi bya / gnyis ma yin par yang ma yin /

column1: na nimittataH na animittatas
column2: mtshan mar ma yin / mtshan ma ma yin par yang ma yin / blang bar ma yin /

column1: na AyUhataH na nirAyUhataH
column2: dor bar ma yin /

column1: na utkzepataH na prakzepataH
column2: bsnan par ma yin / bsnan pa med par yang ma yin /

column1: na saMkleSataH na asaMkleSataH
column2: kun nas nyon mongs par ma yin / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin par yang ma yin / rnam par byang ba ma yin /

column1: na vyavadAnataH na avyavadAnataH
column2: rnam par byang ba ma yin par yang ma yin / spang bar ma yin /

column1: na utsargataH na anutsargataH
column2: spang bar ma yin par yang ma yin / gnas su ma yin /

column1: na sTAnataH na asTAnataH
column2: gnas su ma yin par yang ma yin / sbyor bar ma yin /

column1: na yogataH na ayogataH
column2: sbyor bar ma yin par yang ma yin / 'brel bar ma yin /

column1: na saMbanDataH na asaMbanDataH
column2: 'brel par ma yin par yang ma yin /

column1: na pratyayataH na apratyayataH
column2: rkyen du ma yin / rkyen du ma yin par yang ma yin / chos su ma yin /

column1: na DarmataH na aDarmataH
column2: chos ma yin par yang ma yin /

column1: na taTatayA
column2: de bzhin nyid ma yin /

column1: na ataTa tayA
column2: de bzhin nyid ma yin par yang ma yin / yang @476b dag pa'i mtha' ma yin /

column1: na BUtakowyA na aBUta kowI AveditavyA
column2: yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin par yang ma yin no //

column1: evam eva ayam sa kOSika prajQApAramitAyAH arTaH
column2: koo shi ka / de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ni /

column1: tat yaTA sarva Darma sama tvAt prajQApAramitA samA
column2: 'di lta ste / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid mnyam mo // chos thams cad zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo //

column1: sarva Darma vivikta tvAt prajQApAramitA viviktA
column2: chos thams cad dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben no //

column1: sarva Darma acala tvAt prajQApAramitA acalA sarva DarmAm anya tvAt prajQApAramitA amanyatA sarva Darma aBIru tvAt prajQApAramitA aBIru
column2: chos thams cad g-yo ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa g-yo ba med pa'o // chos thams cad rlom sems med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rlom sems med // do //

column1: sarva DarmAt SamBita tayA prajQApAramitA acCamBI
column2: chos thams cad 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jigs // do // pa med do // chos thams cad bag tsha ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bag tsha ba med do //

column1: sarva Darma eka rasa tvAt prajQApAramitA ekarasA
column2: chos thams cad ro gcig pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ro gcig go /

column1: sarva Darma anutpAda tvAt prajQApAramitA anutpAdA sarva Darma aniroDa tvAt prajQApAramitA aniroDA
column2: chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med do // chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag pa med // do //

column1: gagana kalpa tvAt sarva DarmANAm prajQApAramitA gagana kalpA
column2: chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bu'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nam // do //

column1: rUpa aparyanta tvAt prajQApAramitA aparyantA
column2: mkha' lta bu'o // gzugs mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa // do //

column1: evam vedanA saMjQA saMskAra vijQAna aparyanta tvAt prajQApAramitA aparyantA
column2: mkha' lta bu'o // mu med do // de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / @477a *// rnam par shes pa mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do //

column1: pRTivI DAtu aparyanta tvAt prajQApAramitA aparyantA
column2: sa'i khams mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do //

column1: evam ap DAtu  tejaH DAtu  vAyuDAtu  AkASa DAtu  vijQAna DAtu aparyanta tvAt prajQApAramitA aparyantA sumeru aparyanta tvAt prajQApAramitA aparyantA samudra aparyanta tvAt prajQApAramitA aparyantA
column2: de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do // rgya mtsho mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do //

column1: vajra sama tvAt prajQApAramitA samA sarva Darma aBeda tvAt prajQApAramitA aBedA sarva Darma svaBAvA
column2: rdo rje mnyam pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam mo; ;chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dbyer med do //

column1: nupalabDi tvAt prajQApAramitA anupalabDiH sarva Darma viBAvanA sama tvAt prajQApAramitAa viBAvanA  samA
column2: chos thams cad ngo bo nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid dmigs su med do dbyer med do //

column1: sarva Darma niScezwa tvAt prajQApAramitA niScezwA
column2: // chos thams cad bsal ba med par mnyam pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsal ba med par mnyam mo; ;chos thams cad byed pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byed pa med do //

column1: sarva Darma acintya tvAt prajQApAramitA acintya iti
column2: chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo //

column1: evam dAna pAramitA  SIla pAramitA  kzAnti pAramitA  vIrya pAramitA  DyAna pAramitA  prajQApAramitA tri maNxala pariSudDi aparyanta tvAt paparyantAH iti
column2: de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa @477b dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do //

column1: prajQApAramitA ucyate yat uta azwAdaSa SUnyatA
column2: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid bco brgyad de / 'di lta ste /

column1: tat yaTA  ADyAtma SUnyatA bahirDA SUnyatA ADyAtma abahirDA SUnyatA SUnyatA SUnyatA mahA SUnyatA parama arTa SUnyatA saMskRta SUnyatA asaMskRta SUnyatA atyanta SUnyatA anAdi agra SUnyatA ana pakAra SUnyatA prakRti SUnyatA sva lakzaNa SUnyatA sarva Darma SUnyatA anupalamBa SUnyatA aBAva SUnyatA svaBAva SUnyatA aBAva svaBAva SUny
column2: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang / tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de /

column1: ayam ucyate saMkziptena prajQApAramitA iti
column2: mdor na / stong pa nyid 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //

column1: kOH vEdya  tArakA timiram dIpaH mAyA vaSyAya budDu dam
column2: skar ma rab rib mar me dang // sgyu ma zil pa chu bur dang // rmi lam glog dang sprin @478a *// lta bu //

column2: 'dus byas de ltar blta bar bya //

column1: kti vatsale prasAra haste samASvAsa kare siDya siDya buDya buDya kampa kampa cala cala rAva rAva AgacCa Bagavate mA vilamba svAhA namaH Darma udgatasya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahA kAruNakasya namaH prajQApAramitAyE tat yaTA  muni Darme saMgraha Darme anugraha Darme vimokza Darme sattva anugraha Darme vESramaNa Darme samantanu parivartana Darme guNi graha saMgraha Darme sarvatra anugata Darme sarva kAla paripUrNa Darme svAhA namaH prajQApAramitAyE tat yaTA  aKane niKane muKana neKanea vara vandane pawane pawane paware svAhA namaH prajQApAramitAyE tat yaTA  gaFgA gaFgA na tIra avaBAsa gaFgA svAhA namaH prajQApAramitAyE tat yaTA SrIye SrIye muni SrIye SrIyase svAhA namaH prajQApAramitAyE
column2: na ma bha ga ba tyee a'arya pradzny'a b'a ra mi ta ye /

column1: tat yaTA  om vajra bale svAhA namaH prajQApAramitAyE tat yaTA  om hrI SrI DI Sruti smRti mati gati vijaye svAhA namaH prajQApAramitAyE tat yaTA  bambari bambari mahA bambari bUru bUru mahAbUru svAhA namaH prajQApAramitAyE tat yaTA  hUte hUte hUvita aSane sarva  karma AvaraNane svAhA namaH prajQApAramitAyE tat yaTA  om oroliS svAhA namaH prajQApAramitAyE tat yaTA  om sarva vid svAhA
column2: aom dh'i:hr'i: shr'i shu ti smri ti ma ti ga te bi dza ya sv'ah'a / 'gag pa med cing skye med la // chad pa med cing rtag pa med // tha dad don min don gcig min // 'ong ba med cing 'gro med la // spros bzhi bas zhi ba yi // rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ston pa // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang yin pa //

column1: namaH prajQApAramitAyE tat yaTA  gate gate pAra gate pAra saMgate boDi svAhA
column2: smra mchog de la phyag 'tshal lo //

column1: idam avocat BagavAn
column2: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /

column1: Atta manAH AyuzmAn sAriputraH SakraH devAnAm indraH te ca boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH sA ca sarvAvatI parzad sa deva ganDarva mAnuza AsuraH caBAzitam aByanandan
column2: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
